dcterms:creator: Yaguang Li
Rose Yu
Cyrus Shahabi
Yan Liu
dcterms:description: A traffic speed dataset collected from loop-detectors located on the LA County road network, containing data of 207 selected sensors over a period of 4 months from Mar to Jun in 2012, recorded at a rate of every 5 minutes.
dcterms:title: METR-LA

dcterms:creator: Chao Chen
Karl Petty
Alexander Skabardonis
Pravin Varaiya
Zhanfeng Jia
dcterms:description: A traffic speed dataset collected from California Transportation Agencies (CalTrans) Performance Measurement System (PeMS), containing data of 325 sensors in the Bay Area over a period of 6 months from Jan 1st 2017 to May 31th 2017, recorded at a rate of every 5 minutes.
dcterms:title: PEMS-BAY

dcterms:creator: Shengnan Guo
Youfang Lin
Huaiyu Wan
Xiucheng Li
Gao Cong
dcterms:description: A traffic flow dataset collected from CalTrans PeMS, containing data of 307 sensors in the Bay Area over a period of 2 months from Jan 1st 2018 to Feb 28th 2018, recorded at a rate of every 5 minutes.
dcterms:title: PEMS04
